title: 343: Craig Conant: Our Non-Monogamous King!
itunes:title: 343: Craig Conant: Our Non-Monogamous King!
description:
All is well because #broadsquad fave comedian Craig Conant is back in the studio! The Broads chat and get silly and serious with Craig about new year practices, sobriety, tarot, his open relationship, cheating, love, having “the talk”, p*rn, peeing in pools, not showering, and a whole lot more! Send Craig all the #broadsquad love! And check out his dates/merch/and podcast below! 

 

CRAIG CONANT:

Craig’s tour dates: https://www.craigconant.com/#tour

Craig’s merch: https://craigconantstore.com/

Craig’s podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405

Craig’s Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/craigpconant/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SQUARESPACE: Go to SQUARESPACE.COM/CHATTY for a free trial and when ready to launch, use the code CHATTY to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain!

***MEUNDIES: Get 20% off matching pairs, 15% off your first order, and free shipping at MEUNDIES.COM/CHATTY

***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off the test when you go to MODERFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITTER.COM and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!
***KREATURES OF HABIT: Go to KREATURESOFHABIT.COM and use promo code CHATTY at checkout for 20% off your first order!

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
